bannerText: You may be new to the field of software. You may not know what you need to learn. I'm here to help. With the button below, you can explore your dreams and even map the way to them.
aboutText: Code Your Dreams does not leave its users alone, unlike other educational sites that are actively used in the sector. Instead, it guides its users by being with them. The Code Your Dreams Assistant is an AI-powered recommendation system integrated into the site. It can recommend sectors to beginners based on their interests and past academic achievements, and for experienced developers, it can create the most accurate roadmap for their development aspirations. If you are having trouble drawing your own path, consult our assistant.
whatYouCanDoText: You can improve yourself in any field with coding courses. Don't know what to do for this? Don't worry, our assistants are at your service, let them tell you the appropriate programming language or software field, and you can focus on your development.
assistantSupportText: Examine your past experiences and determine your roadmap with the CodeYourDreams Assistant. You will be directed to document-level trainings for your future education, and by following the path exactly, you can prepare yourself for the sector.
learnText: You can find trainings on the CodeYourDreams website for each step of your Roadmap. Whether to learn or to remember what you forgot, you can use it as a document and easily access the training titles grouped according to your level in software.
practiceText: It is always important to practice to make what you have learned permanent. CodeYourDreams will not leave you alone here either, and there are sections where you can practice alongside each training document, and you can learn your situation by filling them in to test yourself.
continueLearning: Do You Want to Continue Your Training From Where You Left Off?
